officialTitle: Does Bowel Preparation (Either as a Single or Divided Dose) Produce Better Cleansing and Diagnostic Yield Than no Preparation at All in Small Bowel Capsule Endoscopy
inclusionCriteria:
* Adult outpatients (18 years or older)
* routinely referred for small bowel video capsule endoscopy (CE)
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* dysphagia
* severe gastroparesis requiring endoscopic placement of capsule
* small bowel obstruction
* pregnancy
